title: Love Style Test
description: What's your love style? Discover how you love and your tendencies in relationships!

questions.question: What's your ideal date with your partner?

choices.text: An adventure date with activities together
Respecting each other's hobbies with personal time

questions.question: How do you express love to your partner?
When you have a conflict with your partner, you...

choices.text: Try to resolve it through conversation right away
Take time to cool down before talking
Try to lighten the mood with humor
Check on my partner's feelings first

questions.question: The most important quality in a partner is...

choices.text: Someone to try new things with
Someone who respects each other's space

questions.question: How often do you want to communicate with your partner?

choices.text: Constantly throughout the day, always connected
Once or twice a day is enough

questions.question: Your relationship with your partner's friends?

choices.text: I want to actively become close
I'd like to get along comfortably
I want to maintain an appropriate distance
I don't mind as long as I'm with my partner

questions.question: What do you think about jealousy?

choices.text: I think it's an expression of love

questions.question: When giving a gift to your partner, you...

choices.text: A romantic relationship with daily excitement

questions.question: When your partner is having a hard time, you...

choices.text: Suggest activities to change their mood
Give them time to sort things out alone

results.title: The Romantic
results.description: You dream of romantic love! When you fall in love, you devote your whole heart and are expressive about your feelings. You value special anniversaries and events, cherishing time with your partner.
results.advice: Consider practical aspects too. Sometimes love can be felt in simple everyday moments. Understand that your partner may express love differently.

results.title: The Devoted
results.description: You're the type to devote yourself entirely to your partner! You'd do anything for the one you love and value deep bonds in relationships. You willingly sacrifice for your partner and give unchanging love.
results.advice: Don't forget to take care of yourself. It's great to care for your partner, but your happiness matters too. Allow yourself to receive sometimes.

results.title: The Adventurer
results.description: You seek new challenges and excitement even in love! You love sharing new experiences together and enjoy bringing change to daily life. You want passionate and energetic romance.
results.advice: Sometimes stability is needed. Seeking new things is great, but take time to build deep bonds too. Understand that your partner might not enjoy adventures.

results.title: The Stability Seeker
results.description: You want a comfortable and stable relationship! You value relationships based on trust and faith, enjoying sharing simple everyday happiness together. You seek to give and receive unchanging love.
results.advice: Try new things occasionally. Stability is good, but small changes can bring vitality to the relationship. Understand your partner's adventurous side too.

results.title: The Independent
results.description: You value your own space and time even while in a relationship! You want a relationship where you respect each other and value individual lives. You can maintain a healthy distance while still sharing deep love.
results.advice: Sometimes try getting closer. Keeping distance is fine, but your partner might feel lonely. Practice expressing your emotions too.

results.title: The Fun-Seeker
results.description: You value fun and enjoyment in love! You bring vitality to relationships with humor and playfulness, cherishing times when you can laugh together. You enjoy love with a light heart.
results.advice: Serious conversations are needed too. You can't always be laughing. Listen to your partner's serious emotions as well.

results.title: The Rational
results.description: You value rational judgment even in love! Rather than being swept by emotions, you analyze situations calmly and pursue reasonable relationships. When problems arise, you try to solve them logically.
results.advice: Pay attention to emotional expression too. Logic alone can't fill your partner's heart. It's okay to react emotionally sometimes.
